name: 梁曉帆
objective: 此課程旨在以人為本，研究互動系統之設計與評估。使學生了解人類認知過程之理論與模式以及其工作與環境之特性，並使學生能應用設計程序與評估方法來提升系統之績效。
schedule:
Week 1-2: What is human-computer interaction?
Week 3-7: What is human information processing?
Week 8-11: What is the context of use?
Week 12-15: How to design, analyze, and evaluate an interactive system?
Week 16-18: Final project and presentation
scorePolicy: Reading and presentation (20%), Project (25%x2), Final project and presentation (30%)
